amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to expedite the completion of the Cedar River flood risk management project authorized in 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blum amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Blum.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blum amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
